response.overview: Chen old man to pick up his granddaughter from school, on the way to see the bulletin board on the ban on fireworks and firecrackers after the notice, sighing, he has not been several years of public performances of the drug hair puppets ...... Chen old man fiddling with the drug hair puppets in the home, his granddaughter Jing Jing see a tin cans are very curious to open to play, but accidentally caused the fire, the tin cans exploded! ...... explosion, Chen old man and granddaughter Jing Jing body swap. Now the appearance of the vicissitudes of the Chen old man inside a girl's heart, and the magnificent Chen Jing Jing inside is a stingy old man ...... a series of chain reaction occurs, a laughable story formally staged in this quiet countryside!
response.title: Pretend to Be Immodest
